dev.nokee.platform.base

Interface Variant

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BinaryAwareComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IosApplication, JniLibrary, NativeApplication, NativeLibrary

    public interface Variant
extends BinaryAwareComponent
    A variant realization of a component.
    Since:
    0.2

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BinaryView<Binary> getBinaries()
      Configure the binaries of this variant.
      Provider<Binary> getDevelopmentBinary()
      Returns a the development binary for this variant.

    • Method Detail

      • getBinaries

        BinaryView<Binary> getBinaries()
        Configure the binaries of this variant. The view contains only the binaries participating to this variant.
        Specified by:
        getBinaries in interface BinaryAwareComponent
        Returns:
        a BinaryView for configuring each binary, never null.
        Since:
        0.4

      • getDevelopmentBinary

        Provider<Binary> getDevelopmentBinary()
        Returns a the development binary for this variant. The development binary is used by lifecycle tasks.
        Returns:
        a provider for the development binary, never null.
        Since:
        0.4
